QuestData.Title: Rooter the Ravenous
QuestData.Description: The stray boar is digging through garbage left behind by the iron horde. He stops chewing and stares at you-then he burps.$b$bHe smells terrible.$b$bIt looks like he's chewing on a chunk of rotten meat. Maybe you can find something a bit healthier for him to snack on?
QuestData.LogDescription: Find food for Rooter at Rooter's Pass in Gorgrond.
QuestData.CompletionText: That rotten meat looks gross. Find rooter something healthy to eat.
QuestData.RewardText: You feed the hungry boar the nopales. He devours them whole and smacks his lips.$b$bRooter jumps up onto you and licks your face with his disgusting tongue.$b$bIt looks like you have made a new friend.
